title: Collecting coefficients of polynomial matrices
content: In this section, the decomposition of polynomial matrices into (polynomial) multiples of constant (polynomial) matrices is prepared by collecting the coefficients of a polynomial matrix which belong to the same power of the polynomial variable. Such a collection is given by the function` decompPMat ` (see ~ df-decpmat ), which maps a polynomial matrix ` M ` to a constant matrix consisting of the coefficients of the scaled monomials ` ( ( c `` k ) .* ( k .^ X ) ) ` , i.e. the coefficients belonging to the k-th power of the polynomial variable ` X ` , of each entry in the polynomial matrix ` M `. The resulting decomposition is provided by theorem ~ pmatcollpw .

blocks.name: cdecpmat
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the decomposition of polynomial matrices.
blocks.origin: const class cdecpmat { decompPMat }

blocks.name: diff.cdecpmat.s
diff.cdecpmat.c
diff.cdecpmat.w
df-decpmat
blocks.content: Define the decomposition of polynomial matrices. This function collects the coefficients of a polynomial matrix ` m ` belong to the ` k ` th power of the polynomial variable for each entry of ` m ` . (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-decpmat(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cdecpmat, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cn0, cmpo(s2, s3, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3))), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-decpmat(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ decompPMat =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà dom(dom(s0)), s3 ‚àà dom(dom(s0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s2[s0]s3))` s1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: decpmatval0
blocks.content: The matrix consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of a polynomial matrix for the same power, most general version. (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm decpmatval0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, cdecpmat, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cdecpmat, c2, cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2)), universe, cn0, cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs1))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(cdecpmat, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, cn0, cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs1))))))
  df-decpmat(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs1))), cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2))))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs1)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  dmeqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0)))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  fveq12d(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs1), cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  fveq2d(cco1, co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2)), universe), wa(wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wa(wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe)))
  jca(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe), wcel(cdm(cdm(c0)), universe))
  dmexd(cdm(c0), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  dmexg(c0, c1)
  mpt2exga(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), universe, cdm(cdm(c0)), universe, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cdm(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm decpmatval0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)‚Üí(c0[decompPMat]c2)=(s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, cdecpmat, c2, (s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)), universe, cn0, (s0 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[hs0]s1))` hs1)), universe, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), decompPMat =(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(s0 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[hs0]s1))` hs1))))
  df-decpmat(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (s0 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[hs0]s1))` hs1))=(s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, dom(dom(hs0)), dom(dom(hs0)), ((coe1 `(s0[hs0]s1))` hs1), dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c0)), ((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  dmeqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, dom(hs0)= dom(c0))
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  fveq12d((coe1 `(s0[hs0]s1)), hs1, (coe1 `(s0[c0]s1)), c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  adantr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (coe1 `(s0[hs0]s1))=(coe1 `(s0[c0]s1)))
  fveq2d(cco1, (s0[hs0]s1), (s0[c0]s1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, s0, s1)
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0), (s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2))‚àà ùïå, (dom(dom(c0))‚àà ùïå ‚àß dom(dom(c0))‚àà ùïå))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, (dom(dom(c0))‚àà ùïå ‚àß dom(dom(c0))‚àà ùïå))
  jca(c0 ‚àà c1, dom(dom(c0))‚àà ùïå, dom(dom(c0))‚àà ùïå)
  dmexd(dom(c0), universe, c0 ‚àà c1)
  dmexg(c0, c1)
  mpt2exga(s0, s1, dom(dom(c0)), universe, dom(dom(c0)), universe, ((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: decpmatval
blocks.content: The matrix consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of a polynomial matrix for the same power, general version for arbitrary matrices. (Contributed by AV, 28-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm decpmatval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wceq(co(c0, cdecpmat, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, cmat, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdecpmat, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  decpmatval0(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2), c3, c3, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0), wceq(cdm(cdm(c0)), c3))
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(cdm(c0)), c3), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cxp(c3, c3))), wf(c0, cxp(c3, c3), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  matbas2i(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c5), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  elmapi(c0, cfv(cbs, c5), cxp(c3, c3))
  syl6eq(cdm(cdm(c0)), c3, cdm(cxp(c3, c3)), wf(c0, cxp(c3, c3), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  dmeqd(cdm(c0), cxp(c3, c3), wf(c0, cxp(c3, c3), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  fdm(c0, cxp(c3, c3), cfv(cbs, c5))
  dmxpid(c3)
  eqidd(cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm decpmatval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)‚Üí(c0[decompPMat]c2)=(s0 ‚àà c3, s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c3[Mat]c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[decompPMat]c2), (s0 ‚àà c3, s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)), (s0 ‚àà dom(dom(c0)), s1 ‚àà dom(dom(c0))‚Ü¶((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  decpmatval0(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, dom(dom(c0)), dom(dom(c0)), ((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2), c3, c3, ((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, dom(dom(c0))= c3)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà c1, dom(dom(c0))= c3, c0 ‚àà((Base ` c5)[‚Ü¶](c3 √ó c3)), (c0 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí(Base ` c5)))
  matbas2i(c0, c1, (Base ` c5), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid((Base ` c5))
  elmapi(c0, (Base ` c5), (c3 √ó c3))
  syl6eq(dom(dom(c0)), c3, dom((c3 √ó c3)), (c0 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí(Base ` c5)))
  dmeqd(dom(c0), (c3 √ó c3), (c0 :(c3 √ó c3)‚Üí(Base ` c5)))
  fdm(c0, (c3 √ó c3), (Base ` c5))
  dmxpid(c3)
  eqidd(((coe1 `(s0[c0]s1))` c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: decpmate
blocks.content: An entry of the matrix consisting of the coefficients in the entries of a polynomial matrix is the corresponding coefficient in the polynomial entry of the given matrix. (Contributed by AV, 28-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm decpmate(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wcel(c5, c6), wcel(c7, c6))), wceq(co(c5, co(c2, cdecpmat, c4), c7), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(c5, c2, c7)), c4)))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c9, co(c6, cmat, c8))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c9))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wcel(c5, c6), wcel(c7, c6))), wceq(co(c5, co(c2, cdecpmat, c4), c7), cfv(cfv(cco1, co(c5, c2, c7)), c4))), wceq(c8, cfv(cpl1, c0)))
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c5, co(c2, cdecpmat, c4), c7, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(c5, c2, c7)), c4), c6, c6, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), c4), universe, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wcel(c5, c6), wcel(c7, c6))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wcel(c5, c6), wcel(c7, c6)), wceq(co(c2, cdecpmat, c4), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c6, c6, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), c4))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, cn0), wceq(co(c2, cdecpmat, c4), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c6, c6, cfv(cfv(cco1, co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))), c4))))
  decpmatval(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c4, c6, c9, c8)

blocks.name: decpmatmul
blocks.content: The matrix consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of the product of two polynomial matrices is a sum of products of the matrices consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of the polynomial matrices for the same power. (Contributed by AV, 21-Oct-2019.) (Revised by AV, 3-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm decpmatmul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c4, cn0)), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5), c3), cdecpmat, c4), co(c6, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c4), co(co(c1, cdecpmat, cv(s0)), cfv(cmulr, c6), co(c3, cdecpmat, co(c4, cmin, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c8, cmat, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c8, cmat, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)

blocks.name: pmatcollpw1lem2
blocks.content: Lemma 2 for ~ pmatcollpw1 : An entry of a polynomial matrix is the sum of the entries of the matrix consisting of the coefficients in the entries of the polynomial matrix multiplied with the corresponding power of the variable. (Contributed by AV, 25-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 3-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: pmatcollpw2
blocks.content: Write a polynomial matrix as a sum of matrices whose entries are products of variable powers and constant polynomials collecting like powers. (Contributed by AV, 3-Oct-2019.) (Revised by AV, 3-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: monmatcollpw
blocks.content: The matrix consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of a polynomial matrix having scaled monomials with the same power as entries is the matrix of the coefficients of the monomials or a zero matrix. Generalization of ~ decpmatid (but requires ` R ` to be commutative!). (Contributed by AV, 11-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.)

thm monmatcollpw(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, class c12, class c13) {

}

blocks.name: pmatcollpw
blocks.content: Write a polynomial matrix (over a commutative ring) as a sum of products of variable powers and constant matrices with scalar entries. (Contributed by AV, 26-Oct-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmatcollpw(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, ccrg), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(cv(s0), c5, c6), c7, cfv(c8, co(c2, cdecpmat, cv(s0))))))))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cmat, c9))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, c9)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cv1, c1))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c0, cmat2pmat, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

blocks.name: pmatcollpwfi
blocks.content: Write a polynomial matrix (over a commutative ring) as a finite sum of products of variable powers and constant matrices with scalar entries. (Contributed by AV, 4-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmatcollpwfi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, ccrg), wcel(c2, c3)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(s1), c5, c6), c7, cfv(c8, co(c2, cdecpmat, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cmat, c9))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, c9)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cv1, c1))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c0, cmat2pmat, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)

blocks.name: pmatcollpw3lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ pmatcollpw3 and ~ pmatcollpw3fi : Write a polynomial matrix (over a commutative ring) as a sum of products of variable powers and constant matrices with scalar entries. (Contributed by AV, 8-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: pmatcollpw3fi1
blocks.content: Write a polynomial matrix (over a commutative ring) as a finite sum of (at least two) products of variable powers and constant matrices with scalar entries. (Contributed by AV, 6-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: pmatcollpwscmat
blocks.content: Write a scalar matrix over polynomials (over a commutative ring) as a sum of the product of variable powers and constant scalar matrices with scalar entries. (Contributed by AV, 2-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s0, c12)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)

  mpteq2dva(s0, cn0, co(co(cv(s0), c6, c7), c8, cfv(c13, co(c4, cdecpmat, cv(s0)))), co(co(cv(s0), c6, c7), c8, co(cfv(c9, cfv(cfv(cco1, c2), cv(s0))), c8, c10)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, ccrg), wcel(c2, c3)))
